nodes.text: Yadira Ban was a female Lethan Twi'lek Jedi Padawan who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Twi'lek, Yadira Ban was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. A Padawan who had constructed her lightsaber, her final trial was to face a Sith in combat. She was assigned to protect an Imperial defector referred to as "The General" while he was aboard the Brentaal Star, a Republic Thranta-class corvette.
During transit, the Imperial transport Black Talon attacked the Brentaal Star. Ban was killed when Imperial boarders confronted her on the Brentaal Star's engine deck.
